p: c) Some clinical studies [ 6, 25] have shown that vitamin E (a well established antioxidant) may be effective in treating TD. However vitamin E does not cross readily the blood-brain barrier [ 26], which could explain why other studies failed to confirm these results [ 6]. Therefore we considered interesting to investigate the antioxidant potential of the synthesized TPBIA.
